{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xiaomi |model=Mi WiFi Amplifier |revision=2 (R02) |series=N300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=11/2017 |type=range extender, repeater |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Male Type A |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628KN |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=KH |fla1_model=KH25L1605E |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=MediaTek |ram1_model=MT7628KN |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628KN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3; |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=bgn }}
"M33 R02 V0105" is silkscreened on the board.
===Serial=== :UART serial parameters: *115200 baud *8 bits *1 stop bit *No parity *No flow control
==Images== <gallery> xiaomi_R02_panel.jpg|Panel xiaomi_R02_SOC.jpg|WiSoC xiaomi_R02_SPI_Flash_chip.jpg|SPI Flash chip xiaomi_R02_UART.jpg|UART </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
